title: Prevalence and risk factors of depression in U.S. adults post mass shootings: evidence from population-based surveys of multiple communities
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 232

Author(s): M. Abba-Aji, S.M. Abdalla, A. Moreland, C. Rancher, D.G. Kilpatrick, S. Galea
